name: Fowl Business
description:
First off: Donations are widely accepted. Mostly because I'm broke and everybody likes money.

Second: 

Meet your new favorite (Alpha) game:

Fowl Business!

Featuring all the essential needs of any nonessential game:

  • A duck
  • A mysterious backstory that nobody knows at the moment
  • Lots of bread-related dialogue
  • Quest choices
  • Plenty of walking
  • Stupid people
  • Trees. Too many trees.
  • And much more to come!

So you better play this game, and watch along for more updates coming REALLY SOON. Just be patient. I'm only one person.
